bibl.title: An Early Christian Gold Lamella for Headache.
bibl.note: Private collection in London. Asia Minor or Syria (?), early 2nd century A.D. Refers to magical papyri.

bibl.title: Magic and Ritual in the Ancient World

bibl.seg: KOTANSKY Roy, An Early Christian Gold Lamella for Headache.
Paul MIRECKI and Marvin MEYER (Edd.), Magic and Ritual in the Ancient World = Religions in the Graeco-Roman World. 141 (Leiden, 2002) pp. 37-46, 2 ill.
Private collection in London. Asia Minor or Syria (?), early 2nd century A.D. Refers to magical papyri.
